name: Maleficarum
description:
Watch The trailer here!

What is Maleficarum?

Set in medieval Europe, where witchcraft is rampant, hunters come from far and wide to execute these devils.

You are one of them, but have found yourself trapped by a particularly menacing enchantment. You will be tasked with escaping the seemingly endless, repeating rooms of the witch's lair. 

Solve the puzzles quick, or risk losing your mind and being trapped there for eternity...

Maleficarum is a first person, puzzle-solving horror game. You must use skills of observation, attention to detail and problem solving to solve the puzzles and acquire the keys to each room, and all before your sanity runs out. 

As each door opens, you will progress into what appears to be an eerie reflection of the room that came before. You will have until your sanity meter runs out to find or make the key.

Can you escape?

How Do I play?
